    • Method Detail

      • getClassDataFile

        public static java.lang.String getClassDataFile(java.lang.String classID)
        It returns the path to the file that contains all student information for class ideentified by classID.
        Parameters:
        classID - classID Class identifier.
        Returns:
        Path to students' information file

      • getStudentsListFile

        public static java.lang.String getStudentsListFile(java.lang.String classID)
        It returns the path to the file that contains the student list of class ideentified by classID.
        Parameters:
        classID - Class identifier.
        Returns:
        Path to student list file.

      • Path

        public static java.lang.String Path(java.lang.String dir,
                                    java.lang.String file)
        Utility method to compose path
        Parameters:
        dir - Directory full path
        file - File name in dir directory.
        Returns:
        The composed path to the file in dir directory.
